overview: Marking their second anniversary, MIRROR held the live concert "ONE & ALL" at the KITEC Star Hall for six consecutive days in May 2021. Hong Kong's biggest boy band lit up the stage with their chart-topping hits "ASAP", "Warrior", "IGNITED" and "Reflection", and showed their talents with various solo and unit stages.
title: MIRROR "ONE & ALL" LIVE 2021
